analysis: The project is a web application focused on black holes, with existing files for HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The current theme and animations are incomplete, and there are several pending tasks related to enhancing the UI with a black hole theme, including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. The HTML structure needs to be completed to include all necessary sections, and the CSS needs to be updated to reflect the dark, cosmic theme.

improvements.description: Complete the HTML content to ensure all sections are properly included, such as the main content area with interactive planets, animated slides, and other sections related to black holes. Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices.

Complete the CSS file with the full intended dark, cosmic theme including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. Ensure the CSS reflects a black hole theme with appropriate color schemes and animations.

Complete the JavaScript content to ensure all buttons have proper event handlers and functionality. Implement the improved mobile menu toggle functionality with proper event handling, smooth transitions, and user-friendly interactions.
